text: Très ordinaire pour le prix. Le burger était correcte mais la poutine et la salade de choux très discutable. Un burger épicé et piquant servi avec salade de choux plus une  poutine 24,00$

Déçu, je m'attendais à mieux. Les burgers sont corrects. La viande est fraîche, cependant, le fromage et les ingrédients ont peu de goût. De plus, le pain de mon burger était froid.   Les frites sont trop chères. Ce ne sont pas des frites maison, mais surgelées. Donc, oui pour le burger, mais évitez les frites.   Enfin, du côté "alcool c'est assez limité. Il n'y a pas de bière en fut, en fait il n'y avait que deux choix.  Idem en ce qui concerne le vin.

Nice place, friendly service, very good atmosphere. The value for food is very reasonable and some of the dishes were very nice. It is not the best burger in town but sure is tasty. I would come back to it only if I was in the area. I would recommend it if you are into a quick and nice bite. Sure better than the big names and chains.  Overall experience is great, overall taste is OK.  The neighbourhood is very nice, close to the river, so if you have some time go for a walk to burn some of those calories.

I would recommend because..  Pros;  The hamburgers are excellent, home made patties, fresh buns, not the store bought ones, unique sauces and very friendly VERY hard working staff. This restaurant also has a nice selection of beer and wine. I think with the base platform that is already built, this place can only get better.  Cons;  The French fries, onion rings are frozen and the coleslaw is store bought. It's odd to have a A+ burger next to D- side dishes.   This place was happening on a Friday night. It's small and the place was packed with a line up to get in. So this restaurant is certainly doing something right. I don't know if it was just coincidence or customer acquisition strategy but the restaurant was filled with babies and toddlers screaming and running around everywhere with parents that didn't really monitor or care about the kids disrupting the place. I mention this only because I couldn't figure out if this restaurant is a kids restaurant specializing in chicken wings and dipping sauces or adult restaurant with burgers and alcohol.
lousy salads..It's a burget joint. Should stick to only serviing burgers. Start your review...

Nice spot to grab something to eat. We had a pleasure to dine outside. I ordered a chicken sub and my co workers ordered spicy burger.  Everyone was satisfied. They often serve water with no ice so if you are a ice person make sure you request it.  Customer service was friendly. Chicken sub was okay. It had more onions than chicken. The burgers were a little over cooked. Overall nice experience.... average food

Don't know why all the hating. We had two perfectly honest burgers, ok putine, and a fine salad, along with a lovely red beer I had never heard of. Lots of locals and a more pleasant place than many we might have chanced on near p.e. Trudeau airport. Ate outside on a beautiful day and enjoyed it despite the busy traffic not far from our  table.

Première visite à cet endroit.  Premièrement le nom est discutable. Une brasserie qui offre seulement 3 bières..... Du côté vins au verre un seul blanc et 3 rouges étaient offerts. Je suis conscient que c'est un restaurant à hamburger mais un meilleur choix au bar serait apprécié.  Le décor a été complètement refait avec une touche très moderne.  Une terrasse en avant donne directement sur la rue.  Les hamburgers sont fait de viande de buf frais et un grand choix de garniture. Le hamburger était très près de ce que je prépare moi même a la maison.  Malheureusement les frites était faites de congelées. Décevant quand tu as un excellent hamburger. Le service à été excellent.  J'y retourne si je veux un bon burger.

My burger was pink all the way through..very dangerous with ground beef. Against the law in New York State to serve an under cooked burger. Fries are seasoned fries.. not real fries ...i never salt my food..why should the cook presume i want a ton of salt on my fries..discusting! A burger joint that doesn't searve real fries?...forget it!

Delicious burgers, crispy fries Ana amazing beers. I would highly recommend this place! Friendly staff too! Ask for the burger town burger it is to die for. The location is also very well placed, in a very quaint area where you can go for a. Ice walk after a great meal.

J'ai commandé le burger de poulet ''Chubby boss'' et c'était tout simplement délicieux!! Le poulet était mariné et juteux parfaitement. Accompagné de frites de patates douces et d'une mayo épicée.   Le service était correct, la serveuse a prise notre commande, sans plus d'interaction. La personne avec moi voulait commander le burger classique et la serveuse a simplement répondu que ca ne venait pas avec des frites sans mentionner que pour quelques cent de plus elle aurait pus avoir le spécial du midi incluant ce même burger, la frite et la boisson. C'est après avoir choisi un autre burger plus cher, qui venait avec des frites, que nous avons vu l'affiche de la promo sur le mur...
